paragraph.sentence: Usually when I press 'Go to...' and type a number and press 'Go', it simply refreshes at the original page, not the page I inputted.
I need to do twice or so to switch to a new page.
When I choose a page in 'Outline', it stops at the original page.
I need to do this many times to switch a page.
Android 4.1.2 (my Samsung phone) & Android 4.1.1 (my Samsung tab)
